src/parallel/zsc-dgr-src/postcollision_g.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Copy outward g values from the ghosts into inward g values in the real nodes. Copy values of pressure and velocity from the real nodes into the ghost layers. These (u,p) values are required for the interpolation step in "update.f".

MPI exchange is done using non-blocking receive and blocking send pairs (completed by a wait statement) in alternate directions to avoid deadlock. The components of g, u, and p that need to be exchanged are packed into buffer arrays before the exchange.
